div.p: Whether you manage a small fleet or a large rental agency, our system can do it all. It handles bookings, tracking, billing, customer management, and more.

a.class: btn rippler rippler-default sh_call_to_action_btn sh_talk_to_us btn-1

div.div: “The real-time updates and automated billing saved us countless hours. Our operations are smoother, and revenue has noticeably increased.”
- Priyen Doshi
What is the Vehicle Rental Management System?
div.p: It helps rental businesses keep track of vehicle availability, payments, and performance reports. This system has a clean interface and strong features.
It provides real-time data, which helps reduce errors. It also saves time and boosts customer satisfaction.

div.div: Core Modules & Features

ul.li: Real-time booking system with kanban view
Dynamic pricing options for weekends, holidays, or long-term rentals
SMS & email notifications for bookings, cancellations, and reminders
Check vehicle availability with date and time filters.
Centralized dashboard to manage your entire fleet
Track vehicle status: available, booked, under maintenance, etc.
Assign and unassign vehicles quickly
Upload registration, insurance, pollution documents, and get expiry reminders
Monitor live locations of your vehicles
View route history and optimize driving behavior
Protect your assets from misuse or unauthorized trips
Multiple payment methods: cash, card, digital wallets
Auto-generate invoices based on rental duration and pricing rules
Tax calculation based on country or region
Generate receipts and share via email or WhatsApp
Create detailed profiles for customers and drivers
Upload documents (license, ID, insurance, etc.)
Track booking history, complaints, and ratings
Assign vehicles to specific drivers with time/distance tracking
Daily, weekly, monthly rental summaries
Earnings and revenue reports
Most rented vehicles, busiest times, top customers
Export reports in Excel, PDF, and more
Manage multiple rental offices or locations in one platform
Role-based access for managers and staff per location
Centralized data with branch-wise segregation
